thread.section_title: InnoMax Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of InnoMax | innomax.com
thread.title: RICK

author: RICK
title: RICK
text: I have a 20 plus year old air mattress which is in good condition except that the two air chambers both developed leaks. I also sleep in between a couple of children and that meant sagging between the two chambers. Purchased a single queen air chamber and pump from InnoMax. Both seem to be good quality and I prefer the single chamber/ The bed is much more stable and doesn't sag in the middle. Their basic pump is pretty quiet compared to my previous pump but takes a lot longer to inflate the bed. Not an issue once fully inflated.
